resources.string: Your Location will be saved with attendance. It is very much required that you allow us to capture your location.
Oops - you seem to have disabled location services at the moment. This app needs your location to save it with yout attendance. To continue, please click on "OK".
Oops - you seem to have disabled location services at the moment. This app needs your location to save it with yout attendance. To continue, please click on "OK" and enable location.
You have permanently declined the location permission. But this app needs your location. Click "OK" to change the permission settings.
Sorry this app can not continue if you provide a mocked location
